description:
Pain (Animal Path) was the second of Nagato`s Six Paths of Pain to be shown. It is the only path shown to have existed as two different bodies. The first Animal Path was captured by Jiraiya and sent to Konoha for study. It was replaced with a female body and the original was later recovered and destroyed by the Preta Path during the invasion of Pain. The second Animal Path was later incapacitated by Naruto`s Sage Technique: Rasenrengan.
This entry is for the original Animal Path.
name: Pain (Chikushoudou)
